#Documents the internal stuff we have set up for git

= Mirroring to github =

= One Time setup =

{{{
# Install some .ssh key to a github user that is allowed to push to our github repo
git clone https://code.google.com/p/selenium/ mirrorRepo
cd mirrorRepo
git remote add github git@github.com:SeleniumHQ/selenium.git
}}}

= script =


The basic script to mirror to github is as follows:
{{{
cd mirrorRepo
git fetch origin
git push --mirror github
}}}
